description: The entire project is crafted in TypeScript. To view the TypeScript configuration, check out the tsconfig.json file.

Feel free to dive in and explore. Just a heads-up: the typeRoots configuration points to src/types, in addition to the default location in node_modules. Some package types had to be manually declared. When you're ready, just click anywhere inside the code editor to proceed.
Given that the theme is unique for each project, its type needs to be defined on an individual project basis. To proceed, simply click anywhere within the code editor.
Let's open file with the FileExplorer component!
Here, you'll come across the recursive 'FolderStructure' type, which represents the folder structure required by the FileExplorer component.

The TourComponentWrapperProps is an example of a generic type. The TourComponent renders passed in Component and passes provided componentProps to it. The generic parameter P denotes the type of props for the Component. Meanwhile, the T parameter is utilized to annotate the type for the React ref attribute, which is subsequently passed to the Component as a ref parameter.
